experience.title: Cast member (actor-singer) and writer for the RealAD Show 2018
experience.description: RealAD is a musical that was spearheaded by Elizabeth Swados, a Tony Award nominated musician, writer, and theatre director. As a cast member and writer in this production, I spent 3 months developing the script and rehearsing at the NYU Tisch School of the Arts. We performed the musical in 2018 to an audience of 500+ people in Abu Dhabi.
